data.eml:eml: Taxonomic study of the planthopper genus Lacusa Stal, 1862 (Hemiptera, Fulgoromorpha, Lophopidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Xing, Jichun, Chen, Xiangsheng (2014): Taxonomic study of the planthopper genus Lacusa Stal, 1862 (Hemiptera, Fulgoromorpha, Lophopidae). ZooKeys 405: 139-148, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.405.6981, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.405.6981
